scripts.build-assets:force: rm -rf node_modules **/node_modules && pnpm enable-canvas && pnpm install && pnpm dev:setup && pnpm build-assets && pnpm disable-canvas
scripts.build:client: rm -rf ./dist/ares && pnpm fbt && pnpm vite build --outDir ../dist/ares -c ./ares/vite.config.ts ./ares/
scripts.build:demo: export IS_DEMO=1 && rm -rf ./dist/ares-demo && pnpm fbt && pnpm vite build --outDir ../dist/ares-demo -c ./ares/vite.config.ts ./ares/
scripts.build:docker-server: RELEASE_ID=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) docker buildx build --load -f Dockerfile --platform=linux/amd64 --tag athena-crisis --build-arg RELEASE_ID=$RELEASE_ID .
scripts.build:splash: rm -rf ./dist/deimos && pnpm vite build --outDir ../dist/deimos -c ./deimos/vite.config.ts ./deimos/ && pnpm build:docs
scripts.dev:prisma-generate: if [ -d artemis/prisma ]; then pnpm prisma generate; else exit 0; fi
scripts.dev:setup: pnpm dev:prisma-generate && pnpm relay && pnpm codegen && pnpm fbt
scripts.disable-canvas: jq '.pnpm.neverBuiltDependencies = ["canvas"]' package.json > package-canvas.json && mv package-canvas.json package.json && git restore pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.enable-canvas: jq 'del(.pnpm.neverBuiltDependencies)' package.json > package-canvas.json && mv package-canvas.json package.json && canvasKey=$(yq e '.packages | keys' pnpm-lock.yaml | grep 'canvas@2\.' | head -n 1 | sed 's/- //') && yq e ".packages[\"$canvasKey\"].requiresBuild = true" -i pnpm-lock.yaml && yq e 'del(.neverBuiltDependencies)' -i pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.fbt: cd ares && if [ -d src ]; then pnpm fbt; else exit 0; fi
scripts.i18n:upload: (cd ares && pnpm fbt:manifest && pnpm fbt:collect) && crowdin upload sources
scripts.preinstall: command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1 && git config core.hooksPath git-hooks || true
scripts.relay: cd ares && if [ -d src ]; then pnpm relay-compiler; else exit 0; fi
scripts.test:ci: pnpm npm-run-all --parallel tsc:check lint lint:format vitest:run-ci
scripts.test: npm-run-all --parallel tsc:check lint lint:format relay vitest:run
scripts.vitest:run: CPUS=$(if uname -s | grep -q Darwin; then sysctl -n hw.ncpu; else nproc --all; fi); export VITEST_MAX_THREADS=$(($CPUS - 2)); export VITEST_MIN_THREADS=$(($CPUS - 2)); vitest run
